From Wiki

Linux: Fstab

/etc/fstab

Partition'ların açılışta mount edilmesi(bağlanması) 


# / was on /dev/sda6 during installation
UUID=abababab-ababa-4ed9-aadc-5296bab1d9a1 /               ext4    errors=remount-ro 0       1

# swap was on /dev/sda3 during installation
UUID=4fccf4b4-ead6-454f-89cd-d571a51a0231 none            swap    sw              0       0

/dev/scd0       /media/cdrom0   udf,iso9660 user,noauto,exec,utf8 0       0
/dev/fd0        /media/floppy0  auto    rw,user,noauto,exec,utf8 0       0

# XP
/dev/sda1 /media/sda1 ntfs defaults,uid=1000,gid=100 0 0

# ext3
/dev/sda2 /media/sda2 ext3 defaults 0 0

# win1
/dev/sdb1 /media/sdb1 vfat defaults,uid=1000,gid=100 0 0

# win2
/dev/sdb5 /media/sdb5 vfat defaults,uid=1000,gid=100 0 0
